query:
-- Total obsolescence cost avoided over the last 30 days
SELECT
  DATE(date)          AS day,
  SUM(obsolescence)   AS cost_avoided
FROM metrics
WHERE id = 'cmcw1zaxw0003p1qk1fo9ss8m'
  AND DATE(date) >= DATE('now', '-30 days')
GROUP BY DATE(date)
ORDER BY day;

-- Count of total alerts by type in June 2025
SELECT
  alert_type,
  COUNT(*)          AS total_alerts
FROM metrics
WHERE id = 'cmcw3crxh0001poqkt5ctjjb0'
  AND DATE(date) BETWEEN DATE('2025-06-01') AND DATE('2025-06-30')
GROUP BY alert_type;

-- Total parts flagged and average per day over last week
SELECT
  SUM(parts_flagged)            AS total_flagged,
  ROUND(AVG(parts_flagged), 2)  AS avg_per_day
FROM metrics
WHERE id = 'cmcw3etd80002poqk6era3ko9'
  AND DATE(date) >= DATE('now', '-7 days');

-- Daily obsolescence values for plotting
SELECT
  DATE(date)        AS day,
  obsolescence_val  AS amount
FROM metrics
WHERE id = 'cmcxgnpq10001wpqk36vpzseb'
  AND DATE(date) BETWEEN DATE('2025-06-02') AND DATE('2025-06-25')
ORDER BY day;

-- Daily counts of 'Need approval' alerts in June 2025
SELECT
  DATE(date)        AS day,
  COUNT(*)          AS need_approval_count
FROM metrics
WHERE id = 'cmcxhohny0001ykqk3fnzs1qy'
  AND alert_category = 'Need approval'
  AND DATE(date) BETWEEN DATE('2025-06-02') AND DATE('2025-06-25')
GROUP BY DATE(date)
ORDER BY day;
